title: SvelteKit
contents: The framework used to build the GUI of the app and the website.

title: DaisyUI
contents: The CSS framework used to style the GUI of the app and the website.

title: Bun
contents: The runtime used to build the website.

title: Electron
contents: The framework used to build the desktop application.

title: TypeScript
contents: The programming language used to build the GUI of the app and the website.
